languages.text: {n}Корпус когитатора испещрен выцарапанными символами и знаками, густо покрытыми смердящей маслянистой массой. Ваш взгляд цепляется за мелкие пузыри, проступающие на блестящей глади: кажется, сама машина испускает сквозь царапины смердящую жижу, словно поры кожи — пот.{/n}

{n}The cogitator's case is covered with scratched symbols and signs thickly smeared in a pungent oily mass. You spot tiny bubbles emerging from the gleaming metal: it is almost as if the malodorous slime is seeping from these scratches like sweat oozes from pores on human skin.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Корпус когитатора испещрен выцарапанными символами и знаками, густо покрытыми смердящей маслянистой массой. Ваш взгляд цепляется за мелкие пузыри, проступающие на блестящей глади: кажется, сама машина испускает сквозь царапины смердящую жижу, словно поры кожи — пот.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The cogitator's case is covered with scratched symbols and signs smeared in thick pungent oily mass. You spot tiny bubbles that emerge from the gleaming metal: it is almost like the malodorous slime is seeping from these scratches like sweat oozes from pores on human skin.{/n}

{n}The cogitator's case is covered with scratched symbols and signs thickly smeared in a pungent oily mass. You spot tiny bubbles emerging from the gleaming metal: it is almost as if the malodorous slime is seeping from these scratches like sweat oozes from pores on human skin.{/n}

languages.text: {n}这台沉思者的外壳上遍布由划痕组成的符号与印记，上面涂满了刺鼻的油性物质。闪闪发光的金属中冒出了微小的气泡，给人的感觉就像是：这些恶臭的粘液似乎是从这些划痕里渗出来的，仿佛汗水从人类皮肤的毛孔中渗出一样。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator's case is covered with scratched symbols and signs thickly smeared in a pungent oily mass. You spot tiny bubbles emerging from the gleaming metal: it is almost as if the malodorous slime is seeping from these scratches like sweat oozes from pores on human skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}这台思考器的外壳上遍布由划痕组成的符号与印记，上面涂满了刺鼻的油性物质。闪闪发光的金属中冒出了微小的气泡，给人的感觉就像是：这些恶臭的粘液似乎是从这些划痕里渗出来的，仿佛汗水从人类皮肤的毛孔中渗出一样。{/n}

languages.text: {n}La carcasa del cogitador está cubierta de símbolos arañados y señales trazadas con una masa aceitosa y hedionda. Ves pequeñas burbujas que emergen del reluciente metal. Es como si este cieno apestoso brotara de los arañazos como el sudor brota de los poros de la piel humana.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator's case is covered with scratched symbols and signs thickly smeared in a pungent oily mass. You spot tiny bubbles emerging from the gleaming metal: it is almost as if the malodorous slime is seeping from these scratches like sweat oozes from pores on human skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}La carcasa del cogitador está cubierta de símbolos arañados y señales trazadas con una masa aceitosa y hedionda. Ves pequeñas burbujas que emergen del reluciente metal. Es como si este cieno apestoso brotara de los arañazos como el sudor brota de los poros de la piel humana.{/n}

languages.text: {n}考算機の本体を覆っている引っ掻くように刻まれたシンボルとサインは、油か何かでべっとりと汚れている。光る金属から小さな泡が出ていた。まるで人間の皮膚の毛穴から汗がにじみ出るように、悪臭を放つ粘液が傷から染み出ているかのようだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator's case is covered with scratched symbols and signs thickly smeared in a pungent oily mass. You spot tiny bubbles emerging from the gleaming metal: it is almost as if the malodorous slime is seeping from these scratches like sweat oozes from pores on human skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}考算機の本体を覆っている引っ掻くように刻まれたシンボルとサインは、油か何かでべっとりと汚れている。光る金属から小さな泡が出ていた。まるで人間の皮膚の毛穴から汗がにじみ出るように、悪臭を放つ粘液が傷から染み出ているかのようだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Das Gehäuse des Cogitators ist mit eingeritzten Symbolen und Zeichen bedeckt und wurde dick mit einer streng riechenden, öligen Substanz bedeckt. Du bemerkst, dass aus dem glänzenden Metall winzige Blasen austreten, als käme der stinkende Schleim aus den Einritzungen, wie Schweiß aus den Poren menschlicher Haut.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator's case is covered with scratched symbols and signs thickly smeared in a pungent oily mass. You spot tiny bubbles emerging from the gleaming metal: it is almost as if the malodorous slime is seeping from these scratches like sweat oozes from pores on human skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Gehäuse des Cogitators ist mit eingeritzten Symbolen und Zeichen bedeckt und wurde dick mit einer streng riechenden, öligen Substanz bedeckt. Du bemerkst, dass aus dem glänzenden Metall winzige Blasen austreten, als käme der stinkende Schleim aus den Einritzungen, wie Schweiß aus den Poren menschlicher Haut.{/n}

languages.text: {n}De nombreux signes et symboles sont gravés dans le boîtier du cogitateur et généreusement badigeonnés d'une substance huileuse à l'odeur âcre. Vous remarquez que des petites bulles se forment à la surface du métal autrement rutilant, comme si cette graisse malodorante suintait des éraflures telle la sueur des pores sur la peau.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator's case is covered with scratched symbols and signs thickly smeared in a pungent oily mass. You spot tiny bubbles emerging from the gleaming metal: it is almost as if the malodorous slime is seeping from these scratches like sweat oozes from pores on human skin.{/n}

Vous remarquez que des petites bulles se forment à la surface du métal autrement rutilant, comme si cette graisse malodorante suintait des éraflures telle la sueur des pores sur la peau.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Kavramsayarın yüzeyi kalın, yağımsı bir tabaka ile kaplı. Mide bulandıran bu yağımsı tabakanın ardında ise çiziktirilmiş işaretler ve semboller saklı. Işıldayan metalden baloncuklar çıktığını fark ediyorsun. Ceset gibi kokan bu madde, âdeta vücuttan sızan ter gibi çiziklerden dışarı akıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The cogitator's case is covered with scratched symbols and signs thickly smeared in a pungent oily mass. You spot tiny bubbles emerging from the gleaming metal: it is almost as if the malodorous slime is seeping from these scratches like sweat oozes from pores on human skin.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Kavramsayarın yüzeyi kalın, yağımsı bir tabaka ile kaplı. Mide bulandıran bu yağımsı tabakanın ardında ise çiziktirilmiş işaretler ve semboller saklı. Işıldayan metalden baloncuklar çıktığını fark ediyorsun. Ceset gibi kokan bu madde, âdeta bir insanın kanaması gibi çiziklerden dışarı sızıyor.{/n}
